column2: Wow, we had so many messages from our fans yesterday, thank you so much for your input, but more importantly thanks for your support! We love what we do, and we especially love our fans! We will continue to work hard to get on the podium this season! Here is another excellent photo from the Mexico ePrix, courtesy of @kalatas.#GEOXDRAGON#ABBFormulaE#MexicoCityEPrix

Check out our Stories and send us a DM with how you think we are doing, and we will send you a very special present  AMAZING photo taken by @ricardobanuelosm / @automovmex! Thanks for sharing Ricardo.#GEOXDRAGON#ABBFormulaE#MexicoCityEPrix

Our wallpapers will turn your screen into a platform for rousing emotions, beguiling technology and thrilling race action.  CLICK link in BIO. #BMW #BMWM #BMWMMotorsport #wallpaper #WallpaperWednesday #racing #cars #instacars #carsofinsta #supercars
